quotes.quote: You'll have bad times, but it'll always wake you up to the good stuff you weren't paying attention to.
If we had no winter, the spring would not be so pleasant: if we did not sometimes taste of adversity, prosperity would not be so welcome.
I'm full of fears and I do my best to avoid difficulties and any kind of complications. I like everything around me to be clear as crystal and completely calm.
I just don't want to die without a few scars.
The pine stays green in winter, wisdom in hardship.
The only thing that's the end of the world is the end of the world.
In the midst of winter, I finally learned there was in me an invincible summer.
Enclose your heart in times of need with the steel of your determination and your strength. In doing this, all things will be bearable.
Given a choice between grief and nothing, I'd choose grief.
Nothing is predestined. The obstacles of your past can become the gateways that lead to new beginnings.
The real tragedy of the poor is the poverty of their aspirations.
It was no hardship to me to spend long hours reading and writing.
The greater the obstacle, the more glory in overcoming it.
There is no success without hardship.
For every dark night, there's a brighter day.
Never be afraid to fall apart because it is an opportunity to rebuild yourself the way you wish had been all along.
I know God will not give me anything I can't handle. I just wish that He didn't trust me so much.
God tests His people through hardship.
After great pain, a formal feeling comes. The Nerves sit ceremonious, like tombs.
As athletes, we're used to reacting quickly. Here, it's come, stop, come, stop. There's a lot of downtime. That's the toughest part of the day.

You may encounter many defeats, but you must not be defeated. In fact, it may be necessary to encounter the defeats, so you can know who you are, what you can rise from, how you can still come out of it.
The very greatest things, great thoughts, discoveries, inventions have usually been nurtured in hardship, often pondered over in sorrow, and at length established with difficulty.
We acquire the strength we have overcome.
If a man cannot understand the beauty of life, it is probably because life never understood the beauty in him.
If you can find a path with no obstacles, it probably doesn't lead anywhere.
What a weary time those years were, to have the desire and the need to live but not the ability.
Everybody's at war with different things. I'm at war with my own heart sometimes.
Your friends will believe in your potential, your enemies will make you live up to it.
You can't run away from trouble. There ain't no place that far.
The salvation of the world is in man's suffering.
The robbed that smiles, steals something from the thief.
The only thing that overcomes hard luck is hard work.
Sometimes the issue isn't that your problems are so big, it's that you see yourself as being so small.
Sometimes adversity is what you need to face in order to become successful.
The problem is not the problem. The problem is your attitude about the problem.
Life keeps throwing me curve balls and I don't even own a bat. At least my dodging skills are improving.
Your success and happiness lies in you. Resolve to keep happy, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.
It seems like every time you come up something happens to bring you back down.
Even cowards can endure hardship; only the brave can endure suspense.
When you come out of the storm you won't be the same person who walked in. That's what this storm's all about.
Say not that this or that thing came to thwart you; it only came to test you.
You have come into a hard world. I know of only one easy place in it, and that is the grave.
Hardship makes the world obscure.
I shall come, not as one who has escaped pain, but as one who has glorified it.
Fire tests gold, suffering tests brave men.
I think men, growing up, you have to go through some form of hardship. You've got to harden the metal.
Don't know how I kept going. You just do. You have to, so you do.
To learn patience is not to rebel against every hardship.
The healthy and strong individual is the one who asks for help when he needs it. Whether he's got an abscess on his knee or in his soul.
What a weary time those years were -- to have the desire and the need to live but not the ability.

Did you hear about the rose that grew from a crack in the concrete? Proving nature's laws wrong, it learned to walk without having feet. Funny, it seems to by keeping it's dreams; it learned to breathe fresh air. Long live the rose that grew from concrete when no one else even cared.

If a man cannot understand the beauty of life, it is probably because life never understood the beauty in him.	If a man cannot understand the beauty of life, it is probably because life never understood the beauty in him.

Don't be too quick to draw conclusions from what happens to you; simply let it happen. Otherwise it will be too easy for you to look with blame... at your past, which naturally has a share with everything that now meets you.
There are many who don't wish to sleep for fear of nightmares. Sadly, there are many who don't wish to wake for the same fear.

When you leave home to follow your dreams, your road will probably be riddled with potholes, not always paved in happy Technicolor bricks. You'll probably be kicked to the ground 150 million times and told you're nuts by friends and strangers alike. As you progress you may feel lonely or terrified for your physical and emotional safety. You may overestimate your own capabilities or fail to live up to them, and you'll surely fall flat on your face once in a while.

it is clear that we must trust what is difficult; everything alive trusts in it, everything in Nature grows and defends itself any way it can and is spontaneously itself, tries to be itself at all costs and against all opposition. We know little, but that we must trust in what is difficult is a certainty that will never abandon us; it is good to be solitary, for solitude is difficult; that something is difficult must be one more reason for us to do it.
It's easier to bleed than sweat
It's easier to bleed than sweat
It's easier to bleed than sweat

No one is without troubles, without personal hardships and genuine challenges. That fact may not be obvious because most people don't advertise their woes and heartaches. But nobody, not even the purest heart, escapes life without suffering battle scars.
To those who, in spite of everything, still choose goodness
It is more civilized to make fun of life than to bewail it
Life has moments that feel as if the sun has blackened to tar and the entire world turned to ice.
Always do more than he expects of you, never less. Never flinch at any task or hardship. And above all, never shame the lord you serve.
Easily mistaken, it is not about a love for adversity, it is about knowing a strength and a faith so great that adversity, in all its adverse manifestations, hardly even exists.
Explorers like to pretend that they are a select breed of people with iron nerve and an ability to endure terrible hardship.
Only hardship softens the hardness of the human heart.
The worse the passage the more welcome the port.

We need sometimes to escape into open solitudes, into aimlessness, into the moral holiday of running some pure hazard in order to sharpen the edge of life, to taste hardship, and to be compelled to work desperately for a moment at no matter what.”
With hope, we can endure any hardship.
